## Keep up to date about current cyber security issues ##

- [NIST NVD - Latest vulnerabilities](https://nvd.nist.gov/)
- [OWASP Top Ten - List of common web threats and attacks](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/)
- [MITRE CVE - News and latest vulnerabilities](https://cve.mitre.org/)
- [TruKno - Cyber security threat feed and news](https://www.trukno.com/)
- [ThreatPost - Well rounded cyber security news site](https://threatpost.com/)

## Hone your white-hat hacking skills ##

- [Hackthbox - Online CTF style machines](https://hackthebox.edu)
- [Vulnhub - Offline CTF style machines (VM based)](https://vulnhub.com)
- [CTFtime - One-stop list of upcoming CTF competitions](https://ctftime.org/)
- [Overthewire - Online hacking challenges](https://overthewire.org/)
- [Hack.me - Vulnerable web application repository](https://hack.me/)
- [WebSecurity Academy - Test your web security hacking skills](https://portswigger.net/web-security)
- [Root-Me.org - Community hacking challenges](https://www.root-me.org/?lang=en)

## University of Denver Information Security Resources ##

- [Information Security @ DU](https://www.du.edu/it/services/security)
